hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Amr bin Sharid said:"I heard Sharid say: 'I herd the Messenger of Allah say: Whoever kills a small bird for no reason, it will beseech Allah on the Day of Resurrection saying: O Lord, so and so killed me for no reason. And he did not kill me for any beneficial purpose

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَتَلَ عُصْفُورًا بِغَيْرِ حَقِّهَا
chapter.eng-name: The One Who Kills A Small bird For No Reason
